bug.author: rkooo567
bug.summary: Ray SGD / Jenkins CI broken in the latest master.
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h3>What is the problem?</denchmark-h>
Github Action Ray SGD build is broken. (ex, https://github.com/ray-project/ray/runs/783840946) Jenkins CI is broken (you can see it is broken from all the PRs created recently). (ex, https://amplab.cs.berkeley.edu/jenkins/job/Ray-PRB/27293/) Jenkins CI is not running in the master build. (Not sure if it is intended).

comments.comment:
I see <denchmark-code>Could not load dynamic library 'libcuda.so.1'; dlerror: libcuda.so.1: cannot open shared object file: No such file or directory </denchmark-code>
Did some CUDA thing change recently?
Yes, iirc. Do you still see this?
